column4: I went all the way through answering the questions that I thought were correct. Having done that I get to a black screen similar to the terminal. someone suggested Gnome hadn't started for some reason
I have started a fresh install of Server and am currently at "your network is probably not using DHCP"
Jesdiciple, where do I get desktop. When I search in google all links lead to here ....http://www.ubuntu.com/download/ubuntu/download
I cant find any other option to download
